Returns the value of a variable.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/get_value"><code>tf.compat.v1.keras.backend.get_value</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/get_value"><code>tf.compat.v2.keras.backend.get_value</code></a>


``` python
tf.keras.backend.get_value(x)
```

#### Arguments:


* <b>`x`</b>: input variable.
